title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Instructional Design for Developing and Validating Pediatric Ophthalmology Clinical Guidelines

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Educational materials are systematically developed by applying the five stages of the ADDIE model (Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation, Evaluation).

Learners must collect feedback from an expert panel (3 professionals in business/HR) and learners (20+ participants) within two weeks, then submit an improved content proposal meeting at least 6 of the 8 validation checklist criteria.
Pediatric ophthalmology examination procedures (visual acuity measurement, ocular motility tests, etc.) are effectively integrated into the curriculum.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
